protocol.description:
Web services for EMT-REST (JSON) Access.
All service Requests are called as POST, so all parameters should be added into body request.
Responses are JSON formatted text.
All method requests require an idClient and passKey, those values are provided by EMT upon request.
This document is divied into Message definitions and Type definitions

message.name: GetCalendar
message.description: Get EMT Calendar for all days and line schedules for a range of dates

message.name: GetGroups
message.description: Returns every line type and their details

message.name: GetListLines
message.description: Returns lines with description and group

field.name: lines
field.description: If empty string, you get all lines, you can add more than one line separated with pipe character |

message.name: GetNodesLines
message.description: Returns all stop identifiers and his coordinate, name, lines and directions

field.name: nodes
field.description: NodeIds (for example StopId s) may be empty for all stops

message.name: GetRouteLines
message.description: Returns a line/s route with the vertex info to build the route and coordinates for stops and axes

message.name: GetRouteLinesRoute
message.description: Get line route with vertex info to build map and coordinates for Stops

message.name: GetTimesLines
message.description: Returns current schedules for the requested lines

field.name: lines
field.description: Line/s for request, separated with pipe character |

message.name: GetArriveStop
message.description: Gets bus arrive info to a target stop

message.name: GetGroups
message.description: Return a list of groups

message.name: GetInfoLine
message.description: Returns line info in a target date

message.name: GetInfoLineExtended
message.description: Returns line info in a target date

message.name: GetPointsOfInterest
message.description: Returns a list of Points of Interest from a coordinate center with a target radius

message.name: GetPointsOfInterestTypes
message.description: Returns a list of Point of interest types

message.name: GetStopsFromStop
message.description: Returns a list of stops from a target stop with a target radius and the lines arriving to those stops.

message.name: GetStopsFromXY
message.description: Returns a list of stops from a coordinate with a radius and the lines arriving to those stops

message.name: GetStopsLine
message.description: Returns a list of stops related to a line with an optional direction

message.name: GetStreet
message.description: Returns a list of EMT nodes related to a location. All EMT locations are a group of stops within a target radius and the lines related to each stop in the list

message.name: GetStreetFromXY
message.description: Returns a list of stops from a target coordinate

message.name: GetEstimatesIncident
message.description: Get estimate arrival time to stop and its related issues

field.name: txtStopRequiredYN
field.description: Y|N Request Stop info as Text

field.name: audioStopRequiredYN
field.description: Y|N Request Stop info as Audio

field.name: txtEstimationRequiredYN
field.description: Y|N Request estimates required as Text

field.name: audioEstimationRequiredYN
field.description: Y|N Reqeust estimates required as Audio

field.name: txtIncidencesRequiredYN
field.description: Y|N Request incidences required as Text

field.name: audioIncidencesRequiredYN
field.description: Y|N Request incidences required as Audio

message.name: GetStreetRoute
message.description: Request up to three optimal routes from one place to another using bus or walking, source and destination must be in a format known for the system, which means that should have been validated by a GetStreet call

field.name: criteriaSelection
field.description: 11 - Minimal route time, 13 - Minimal changes, 14 - Minimal walk time

field.name: day
field.description: Day for request, optional, if not set, server will use current time

field.name: month
field.description: Month for request, optional, if not set, server will use current time

field.name: year
field.description: Year for request, optional, if not set, server will use current time

field.name: hour
field.description: Hour for request, optional, if not set, server will use current time

field.name: minute
field.description: Minute for request, optional, if not set, server will use current time

field.name: originName
field.description: Name of the Origin point, used for the response formatting

field.name: destinationName
field.description: Name of the Destination point, used for the response formatting

field.name: listRouteData
field.description: Route data as list of RouteDataListItem

field.name: POIS
field.description: POIs in route as list of RouteDataListPOI

field.name: isHead
field.description: true|false Stop is header for this line

field.name: busTimeLeft
field.description: Time to arrive in seconds (if all 9, means more than 20 minutes) (if 0 bus in the stop)

field.name: frequencyA
field.description: Frequency text when heading in direction A

field.name: frequencyB
field.description: Frequency text when heading in direction B

field.name: pmv
field.description: Number of point of variable messaging

field.name: secDetail
field.description: Section details (-1.- Walking route, 10.- Node is a Stop in forward direction , 19.- Node is a corner in forward route (not a Stop) ,20.- Node is a stop in return direction ,29.- Node is a corner in return direction (not a Stop))

field.name: distance
field.description: Distance in meters from route start

field.name: distancePreviousStop
field.description: Distance to previous Stop in meters (not used)

field.name: lines
field.description: Line ids, format is N/m being N the line name and m a value 1 if forward or 2 if backward

field.name: secDetail
field.description: 10 if this is a stop node in line forward direction, 19 if this is a vertex node in line forward direction, 20 if this is a stop node in line backwards direction,29 if this is a vertex node in backwards direction

field.name: nameA
field.description: Line name when direction is A

field.name: nameB
field.description: Line name when direction is B

field.name: typeDay
field.description: FE:Festive | SA:Saturday | V: Friday | LA: Labour day

field.name: timeFirstA
field.description: Start time in forward direction, with format: dd/MM/yyyy H:mm:ss

field.name: timeFirstB
field.description: Start time in backwards direction, with format: dd/MM/yyyy H:mm:ss

field.name: timeEndA
field.description: End time in forward direction, with format: dd/MM/yyyy H:mm:ss

field.name: timeEndB
field.description: End time in backwards direction, with format: dd/MM/yyyy H:mm:ss

field.name: typeDay
field.description: FE:Festive | SA:Saturday | V: Friday | LA: Labour day

field.name: timeFirst
field.description: Start time with format: dd/MM/yyyy H:mm:ss

field.name: timeEnd
field.description: End time with format: dd/MM/yyyy H:mm:ss
